name: TP Fighter
description:
Play as a little adventurer with only 1 power: teleportation.

Teleport yourself and land on an enemy to kill him, and get 1 life! If you don't land on an enemy, you'll lose 1 life but gain a little speed boost for few seconds.

Made for GMTKJam in 48hours.

Art by snarmph.

Programmation (unity c#) by Mathieu Bouchonnet
